title: Dozens of inmates die in a battle between prison gangs in Ecuador
content:
1. Dozens of inmates die in a battle between prison gangs in Ecuador  NPR
  2. Ecuador prison riot: New fighting at Guayaquil jail kills 68  BBC News
  3. Over 50 dead and 12 injured after clashes at same Ecuadorian prison where a riot left more than 100 dead in September  CNN
  4. Battle among Ecuador prison gangs kills at least 68 inmates  ABC News
  5. Ecuador: 68 inmates killed and 25 injured in latest prison massacre  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
